ygData.subject: Re: Slam vs. Bash
ygData.msgSnippet: Bash allows you to interupt casting...which comes in really handy later on, i never use ick in certain dungeons, IE mistmoore.... I highly advise using it as
ygData.messageBody:
Bash allows you to interupt casting...which comes in really handy later on,
i never use ick in certain dungeons, IE mistmoore....

I highly advise using it as soon as you get it so you can max out its
level....it really helps when you are fighting a bad ass mage and you
interrupt half of their spells....

Im not sure how slam works as i am a dark elf...i assume that its roughly
the same thing, except that you dont need a sheild to use it...if you can
interrurt someone's sepll swith slam then by all means use it.

Lothaniel T'Kazz
John Zwanenburg
Tips Support/Support Sipt
